participant_1.background:
I played my guitar on the beach the last time I was on vacation.
I bought a soccer ball with my first paycheck.
I am not close to my family and do not know what they do for a living.
I like to watch psychological thrillers because they make me think about my own life.
now i am a fixture on a weekly telenovela.

participant_2.background:
I recall spending long hours in the woods with my dog, chasing rabbits and playing hide-and-seek.
i am hoping to move to australia soon to marry my boyfriend.
i am a graduate student.
i am a humble baker.
I am single because my time is devoted to rescuing animals.

content.text: How are you today?
I am well, thanks for asking! I am excited to be moving to Australia soon.
That is wonderful! I have always wanted to visit Australia.
Me too! I have a boyfriend there and I am excited to start our life together.
That's great. What are you studying in grad school?
I am studying biology. I want to be a veterinarian.
That's great! I love animals. I am an actor.
Oh, that's so cool! I have always wanted to act.
It's a lot of fun. I love getting to play different characters and tell stories.
I bet it is. What is your favorite show that you have been in?
I am on a weekly telenovela now. It's a lot of work, but it's really fun.
That's great! I hope you have a lot of success with it.
Thanks! I hope so too.
What do you like to do in your free time?
I like to play guitar and go to the beach.
That sounds fun. I like to bake and go for walks in the woods.
That's cool. I have always wanted to learn how to bake.
It's easy! Just follow a recipe and you'll be fine.
Thanks for the tip. I might have to try it out.
You should! It's really fun.
I will
